item.description:
My friend owns this place- Mediterrean, middle eastern and french... Because it is a small place- I will do a set assorted menu price- so not to have confusion of different checks and who got what. We can do alcohol separate-great choice of wines. I am arranging that this week

Try to bring cash- figuring out price Had to change date- there closed sunday for renovations- please update rsvp

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Cafe Azur in Darien!!
